Ghost IDE the everythings app

Ghost IDE (Aka: Ghost Web IDE) is everything ide it has multiple support of programming languages and a lot of fun

Download

Features

Open Source

This app is completely Open Source You can visit the source code up on the website

Secure

This app is completely Free and secure it encrypted to make any user happy and safe

Performance

The App is smooth and Speedy to any android arm8 device to make user expirence more powerful

Powerful

The app has a lot of programming language support such as kotlin java sql etc... You can see full list of languages down below

What's special

Convert json to java and json to Kotlin

Python executor, php executor, java executor, Sass and Scss executor

A Terminal from termux

Supported Languages

Java Kotlin Python Web
Ruby Shell C++ C
C# Sass Scss SQL
